1370: Ghisele was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Nannen at age 21 in 1370.
Had a son with Nannen, Woutermanne, at age 21.
1371: Had a daughter with Nannen, Gheesen, at age 22.
Lost daughter Gheesen when Gheesen was 1 years old.
1372: Had a daughter with Nannen, Truden, at age 23.
1377: Had a daughter with Nannen, Heylewigis, at age 28.
1378: Had a son with Nannen, Diddekin, at age 29.
1380: Had a son with Nannen, Gosuinus, at age 31.
Lost son Diddekin when Diddekin was 3 years old.
